name: horse game (slinky, hardboiledgamer, Filches, NemesiAphemeral, Sopaipipalta)
name_original: horse game (slinky, hardboiledgamer, Filches, NemesiAphemeral, Sopaipipalta)
description:
horse game is a very lovely little game about horse taming out in the relatively vast plains of horsetopia, where wild horses roam carefree. you, a novice horseologist, must travel the lands and catalogue all the crazy horses that reside within.

features:

  • exactly 87 lovely horses to collect
  • delicious apples
  • dialogue
  • a handsome and rugged protagonist
  • four (4)  flavours of jelly
  • multiple minutes of unbridled fun (subjective)
